title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior:
Upon attempting to select the label item, it does not get selected.

Expected Behavior:
The label item should be selectable upon the first attempt.

Note: This issue occurs consistently with any item in the library outline view.
